H0.text: another name for a hairpin bend crossword clue. U-Turn

H1.text: another name for a hairpin bend crossword clue. S-Bend

H2.text: another name for a hairpin bend crossword clue. Spiral

H3.text: another name for a hairpin bend crossword clue. switchback

A4.text: Such turns in ramps and trails may be called switchbacks in American English by analogy with switchback railways.

A5.text: When this routing geometry is used for a rail line, it is called a spiral or a spiral loop.

A6.text: An S-shaped trap is also known as an S-bend.

A7.text: A U-turn in driving refers to performing a 180Â° rotation to reverse the direction of travel.

A8.text: The vortex that is created when water is draining in a sink is often described as a spiral.

A9.text: The Celtic triple-spiral is in fact a pre-Celtic symbol.
